评论详情: This hoodie took so long to come in. Got shipped before Christmas and then suddenly didn’t get any updates regarding this order for a week. The hoodie itself is super thin and doesn’t look like the picture. :/
Material is super thin and the design looks nothing like pictured. Frigging China

I purchased this for my daughter. She loves the design and the pockets but we were disappointed to discover how thin it was. She is a teen who doesn't like to ware coats and unfortunately this was not the coat substitute we were looking for. She will keep it and has been waring it, just not on the 20 F days. It is slightly over sized, which she likes.

评论详情: There's so pockets and the front design is very different from the picture. I'm slightly disappointed

评论概述: Soft and wonderful quality- but looks nothing like the picture
评论详情: Black-d is the incorrect color. It’s more of a bleached reddish brown design instead of the more muted greys and blues depicted on the listing. The design is VERY different too. It looks like a poor attempt to replicate that design. Having said that, the jacket itself is actually super soft and warm and comfortable and well made! Definitely fits me super well as a plus sized person.

评论概述: print good, runs small, material is good, zipper is a lil’ cheap
评论详情: zipper is a little janky and it runs a touch small compared to other generic “medium” hoodies i’m purchased at h&m. but the orint looks good and the sweatshirt material is comfy and is of decent quality
SOOO CUTE and fits so well

评论概述: Not true to size but quality was good
评论详情: The quality of the product was fine. Not great. But could not be worn by the person I bought it for because the extra large was not extra large at all. There were no size charts when I purchased this available in the product description.
The material is very thin; the sweatshirt is lighter than originally let on. You could wear this in summer and not get hot. Print was exactly like the image.

Was a tad worried the quality wouldn’t be sweatshirt like. I was pleasantly surprised! I’m usually a medium-large so I got a large. It just fits me, but comfortably. The only real issue that I have personally with the jacket is the seams that connect the sleeve to the torso, that seam on the inside just bugs me a bit lol. Nothing a long sleeve shirt won’t fix underneath!

评论概述: Quality is not what was expected, but I love it anyways
评论详情: It does run small. The quality isn’t the same as what is shown in the pictures, it’s a lower quality; however, I don’t mind these inaccuracies and still very much enjoy the hoodie. This is just to let others know that the hoodie may not be how you expect it to be. Still love it tho<3
Fantastic design, but runs extremely small. Got the biggest size and didn't even fit my spouse who wears mediums
My tween daughter is into hoodies ans loves this jacket. She wears it all the time.

Love the material. One of my new favorite hoodies. Design is exactly as shown plus theres a spine on the back. I would recommend sizing up though. I did because I wanted it to be slightly baggy and it ended up fitting perfect so size may run a bit small

评论概述: designs pretty off but it’s thick/warm
评论详情: i got this in medium and it fits nice but the design isn’t rlly true to the picture bc i thought it would be more faded/darker and not just white (like the photo). i guess it’s ok but the design is also rlly bad and i don’t really like the material, i guess it’s good for colder days? i was expecting it to be thin but i don’t rlly care if ur a person who likes thick jackets. i think it’s just the design that looks kinda weird but overall it’s like 1-2 stars..i don’t recommend buying it tho…(btw the design is smaller irl, idk why it looks bigger in the photo)
